title: Game Start: Blitzcrank Mission 3 on event's website is different from the one on the client.
body:
① On the event website it is:
Mission 3

**Win five matchmade games**

Get 75 assists
Reward: 30 Tickets


② On the client, it requires 

**Win five PvP Summoner's Rift  games**

Get 75 assists
Reward: 30 Tickets


One of them must be wrong and misguided someone.

replies.body: Thanks for the heads up! Essentially these are saying the same thing, as "matchmade" is referring to a game mode where you enter a queue to be matched with 9 other players. I'll look into getting this updated since it's led to a bit of confusion for some players.

> Essentially these are saying the same thing, as "matchmade" is referring to a game mode where you enter a queue to be matched with 9 other players.

That's not quite true actually
Since there are 9 other players on ARAM but it isn't on summoners rift.... it is on Howling Abyss
Match made just means any mode where you get matched with someone, even coop ai. That's why there's a specific pvp clause for that mission.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=kmyEFOu9,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-08-22T03:53:10.629+0000)
>
> Thanks for the heads up! Essentially these are saying the same thing, as "matchmade" is referring to a game mode where you enter a queue to be matched with 9 other players. I'll look into getting this updated since it's led to a bit of confusion for some players.

"Matchmade" == "9 players" isn't accurate though. The last missions in each line require just a matchmade game and can be completed in TT, in contrast to the wording on the mission cited by the OP. (I just completed the Final Boss: Blitz one in TT)
